text:
Hey All,

Glad to share that <https://www.linkedin.com/company/cedcommerce/|CedCommerce>'s HubSpot BigCommerce Integration App is now officially certified in HubSpot App Marketplace.

The HubSpot Integration for <https://www.linkedin.com/company/bigcommerce/|BigCommerce> ensures efficient e-Commerce data syncing and Abandoned cart recovery process.

Know more: <https://bit.ly/3kOV5Bw>

Thank you :smile:
